subject: Photography
title: Travel Photography
description: A short lesson to help you apply Travel Photography.

hook.text: Travel photography seems easy: go somewhere beautiful, point, and shoot. But the best travel photos tell stories.

buildup.text: Good travel photography goes beyond postcard views. It captures culture, people, food, and daily rituals.

discovery.text: The best travel photographers spend time in one place. Depth beats breadth. Stay longer, see more.

twist.text: Social media homogenized travel photos. Everyone shoots the same angles of the same landmarks. Originality is rare.

climax.text: The most memorable travel photos show what guidebooks don't: the quiet, human moments between the monuments.

punchline.text: The best travel photo isn't the landmark. It's the moment.

quiz.question: What separates great travel photography from tourist snapshots?
options: Capturing culture, people, and daily life beyond landmarks
